title: Zelensky reveals Victory Plan, calls for urgent NATO membership
content: The plan includes permission for strikes inside Russia and assistance with air defenses, but Western reaction to it has been muted so far.
summary: The plan includes permission for strikes inside Russia and assistance with air defenses, but Western reaction to it has been muted so far.

title: Immersive replica of Anne Frank’s secret annex goes to New York exhibit
content: A walk-through replica of the rooms where the Jewish teen Anne Frank and others hid from Nazi occupiers will help a new audience to learn about antisemitism.
summary: A walk-through replica of the rooms where the Jewish teen Anne Frank and others hid from Nazi occupiers will help a new audience to learn about antisemitism.

title: Live updates: Israel strikes southern Beirut; U.S. demands restraint in Lebanon, aid for Gaza
content: Israeli forces targeted Beirut’s southern suburbs with airstrikes, ending several days of relative calm in the Lebanese capital.
summary: Israeli forces targeted Beirut’s southern suburbs with airstrikes, ending several days of relative calm in the Lebanese capital.

title: Weekly rally for return of hostages to resume after brief hiatus

At least 94 killed, 50 injured in fuel tanker explosion in Nigeria
content: The driver of the tanker lost control of the vehicle, which tipped over in Nigeria’s Jigawa state. As locals rushed to retrieve the fuel, the tank exploded.
summary: The driver of the tanker lost control of the vehicle, which tipped over in Nigeria’s Jigawa state. As locals rushed to retrieve the fuel, the tank exploded.

title: U.S. warns Israel it may withhold arms unless Gaza aid starts flowing
As U.S. election nears, gloom settles over Ukraine
content: Zelensky’s victory plan will likely be a far cry from the outright “victory” many hoped for, as cynicism and fatigue set in among Ukraine’s western allies.
summary: Zelensky’s victory plan will likely be a far cry from the outright “victory” many hoped for, as cynicism and fatigue set in among Ukraine’s western allies.

title: U.S. warns Israel arms transfers could halt unless humanitarian situation in Gaza improves
content: Since the spring, the amount of aid delivered to Gaza “has dropped by more than 50 percent,” the United States says.
summary: Since the spring, the amount of aid delivered to Gaza “has dropped by more than 50 percent,” the United States says.

title: Conkers championship caught up in chestnut-of-steel cheating commotion
content: “We think he’s innocent, but we’re just checking,” said a spokesman for the World Conker Championships, of allegations that the male champion swapped a chestnut for a steel nut.
summary: “We think he’s innocent, but we’re just checking,” said a spokesman for the World Conker Championships, of allegations that the male champion swapped a chestnut for a steel nut.

Six people sought new organs. They ended up with HIV.
content: Officials in Brazil’s well-regarded public health system are scrambling to explain this week how six transplant patients received organs infected with HIV.
summary: Officials in Brazil’s well-regarded public health system are scrambling to explain this week how six transplant patients received organs infected with HIV.

title: Netanyahu tells U.S. Israel will strike Iranian military instead of oil or nuclear sites, officials say
Netanyahu tells U.S. that Israel will strike Iranian military, not nuclear or oil, targets, officials say
content: The signal is being seen in Washington as a sign of restraint after concerns that an Israeli strike on oil or nuclear facilities could trigger a wider war.
summary: The signal is being seen in Washington as a sign of restraint after concerns that an Israeli strike on oil or nuclear facilities could trigger a wider war.

title: Hezbollah official says all of Israel is a target after attacks in Lebanon
‘Stunning’ hidden tomb found at Petra site featured in ‘Indiana Jones’
content: Underneath the Treasury in Petra, Jordan, archaeologists found remains and a ceramic vessel some said looked similar to the “Holy Grail” depicted in “Indiana Jones.”
summary: Underneath the Treasury in Petra, Jordan, archaeologists found remains and a ceramic vessel some said looked similar to the “Holy Grail” depicted in “Indiana Jones.”

content: Alexei Moskalyov’s daughter Masha was waiting for him at the gates of the penal colony where he served a year and a half for “discrediting” the Russian army.

title: Rescuers still searching for missing under rubble in north Gaza

title: U.N. Security Council expresses ‘strong concerns’ after peacekeepers hit
Trump wants a U.S. wealth fund that surpasses Norway’s. Some Norwegians aren’t sold.
content: Trump and the Biden White House both say the United States should have a sovereign wealth fund. Norway, home to the world’s largest, may offer a few lessons.
summary: Trump and the Biden White House both say the United States should have a sovereign wealth fund. Norway, home to the world’s largest, may offer a few lessons.

title: Behind the mask: How a soccer star became a cocaine trafficker
content: A former star player for Ajax Amsterdam and the Netherlands became a major cocaine trafficker and has found refuge in the United Arab Emirates, where he continues to play.
summary: A former star player for Ajax Amsterdam and the Netherlands became a major cocaine trafficker and has found refuge in the United Arab Emirates, where he continues to play.

title: Sudan’s civil war fueled by secret arms shipments from UAE and Iran
content: Despite denials, weapons inspection and confidential assessments reveal that both the Rapid Support Forces and Sudanese military are supported from abroad.
summary: Despite denials, weapons inspection and confidential assessments reveal that both the Rapid Support Forces and Sudanese military are supported from abroad.

title: White House, VP Harris mourn Palestinian American boy on anniversary of his killing in Illinois
A frozen human foot found on Mount Everest revives a century-old mystery
content: Remains found on Mount Everest may have belonged to the British climber Andrew Comyn “Sandy” Irvine, who disappeared along with George Mallory in 1924.
summary: Remains found on Mount Everest may have belonged to the British climber Andrew Comyn “Sandy” Irvine, who disappeared along with George Mallory in 1924.

title: After years of spinning on his head, a breakdancer grew a scalp tumor
content: Copenhagen neurosurgeons said in a case study that a tumor created a cone-shaped bump atop a breakdancer’s head.
